#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int lag = 0;

bool cmp(string s1, string s2)
{
        int i = 0;
        while(s1[i] == s2[i] && i < min(s1.size(), s2.size())) i++;
        lag = max(lag, i);
        return s1 > s2;
}

int main()
{
    int n, k;

    cin >> n;

    vector<string> v(n);

    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> v[i];

    sort(v.begin(), v.end());

    for(int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
                for(k = 0; v[i][k] == v[i-1][k] && k < min(v[i].size(), v[i-1].size()); k++);
                lag = max(k, lag);
    }

    cout << lag << endl;


}
